Santa_Monica.Westwood Village Memorial Park Cemetery:
Pierce Brothers Westwood Village Memorial Park & Mortuary is a cemetery and mortuary located in the Westwood Village area of Los Angeles. It is located at 1218 Glendon Avenue in Westwood, with an entrance from Wilshire Boulevard.
The cemetery was established as Sunset Cemetery in 1905, but had been used for burials since the 1880s and was renamed with current name in 1926.
